title: Miley Cyrus and Cody Simpson appear to CONFIRM they've moved in together
text:
Miley Cyrus and Cody Simpson's relationship is little more than a month old, but it seems the pair have already taken things to the next level.

On Monday, the lovebirds appeared to confirm rumours they are now living together, after publicly discussing their shared driveway and garage during an Instagram Live video.

During the stream, Cody and Miley hinted that they've been playing house for some time, with Cody declaring: 'We got matching Teslas! Mine's dirty, hers is clean.'

Have Miley and Cody moved in together already? Miley Cyrus and Cody Simpson's relationship is little more than a month old, but it seems the pair have already taken things to the next level

'Mine's not clean,' the American songstress replied in mock outrage, adding: 'Mine's dirty because mine is sitting in the driveway because yours is in the garage!'

'You can switch them out. Mine's probably full by now,' Cody replied, referring to his vehicle's battery being charged.

Later in the discussion, the pair once again appeared to confirm they've moved in together when they said they haven't spent a minute apart since the beginning of their romance.

PDA alert! On Monday, the lovebirds appeared to confirm rumours they are now living together, after publicly discussing their shared driveway and garage during an Instagram Live video

Miley hinted that Cody was moving into her Los Angeles home earlier this month after she shared a snap of her Australian beau alongside the caption: 'Move in day'.

Cody was seen posing for a selfie in front of a bare room with surfboards and framed photos propped against the walls- leading to speculation he may well have moved in with the pop-star.

It's the latest in a flurry of headlines for Miley, who as recently as September 3rd was reportedly sharing a home with her then-girlfriend Kaitlynn Carter.

The couple that buys Teslas together- stays together! During the stream, Cody and Miley hinted that they've been playing house for some time, with Cody declaring: 'We got matching Teslas! Mine's dirty, hers is clean'

Moving day: Miley hinted that Cody was moving into her Los Angeles home earlier this month after she shared a snap of her Australian beau alongside the caption: 'Move in day'

'They live together and are very happy,' a source told People magazine at the time.

Before her fling with Kaitlynn, Miley was in a long-term relationship with Liam Hemsworth, who she married in December 2018.

Their relationship then went downhill and the pair announced their separation in August this year.

Liam has since been pictured with Australian actress Maddison Brown, with the two caught in a passionate clinch earlier this month.

Going public! Cody and Miley haven't been shy to splash their hot new romance all over social media in recent weeks
description: Miley Cyrus and Cody Simpson's relationship is little more than a month old, but it seems the pair have already taken things to the next level.
authors: Monique Friedlander For Daily Mail Australia
